text: Gavin Whittaker (13 January 1970 - 6 January 2017) was an Australian professional rugby league player. He played as in the front row during the 1990s. He played for the Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs, the Gold Coast Chargers and the Western Suburbs Magpies. He retired in 1998. He was born in Pittsworth, Queensland. Whittaker died from stomach cancer on 6 January 2017 at his home in Parkwood, Queensland. He was 46, and would of turned 47th a week after his death. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gavin Whittaker at the Rugby League Project Category:1970 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Cancer deaths in Queensland Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Sportspeople from Queensland
title: Gavin Whittaker
